XI.ii.2.1.b
.
Death Occurred on or After October 1, 1982
For historical purposes, if the Veteran died on or after October 1, 1982, but before January 1, 1997, payment is made to the surviving spouse for the MOD under
38 CFR 3.20(b)
.
Example
:  A surviving spouse’s entitlement to survivors benefits has been established.  The claim for benefits was received within one year of the Veteran’s death.  The surviving spouse’s rate of payment is less than the Veteran’s rate for the MOD.
Result
:  The surviving spouse is eligible for the Veteran’s rate for the MOD under
38 CFR 3.20(b)
.  Payment for the MOD is made on the original award.
